availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Trimble County and Henry County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Matilda Obannon. Farmer in Trimble County in 1850. Appointed postmaster in Henry County in 1856. Signed a petition written by J. P. Sparks to Thomas Bramlette on behalf of M. B. Ireland in Henry County, September 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trimble County, p. 429B
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, p. 456B
Dodd, Jordan, comp. Kentucky, Compiled Marriages, 1851-1900 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2001.
Original data: Dodd, Jordan, comp. Kentucky Marriages, 1851-1900. See extended description for original data sources listed by county.
Henry County, Kentucky Marriages, 1851-99. County court records located at New Castle, Kentucky. (1851-59 extracted at County Courthouse) Family History Library film numbers (0829280 - 0829286, 1843844 & 1843847).
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, p. 641 (accessed via Ancestry.com).
